sentences.en: A vowel can form a syllable by itself.
sentences.cn: 元音能单独构成音节.

sentences.en: Accentuate the word “accent”on the first syllable.
sentences.cn: 在“accent”一词的第一个音节上加重音符号。

sentences.en: Don't say a syllable about the Infernal Twoness.
sentences.cn: 千万别谈地狱的二元论.

sentences.en: Each Chinese syllable is divided into two parts: onset and rime.
sentences.cn: 每个中文音节都由两部分组成: 声母和韵母.

sentences.en: Education! Science! Learn to read, is lit the torch. Every word of each syllable is launched Mars.
sentences.cn: 教育！科学！学会读书，便是点燃火炬；每个字的每个音节都发射火星。——雨果。

sentences.en: Four - syllable word formation is a special form in Lahu language.
sentences.cn: 四音格词是拉祜语词的一种形式.

sentences.en: He articulated each syllable carefully.
sentences.cn: 他小心而清晰地发出每个音节。

sentences.en: He didn't say a syllable, too.
sentences.cn: 他一言半字也未说.

sentences.en: In speaking English do not swallow a single syllable , however short it may be.
sentences.cn: 讲英语时,哪怕是再短的音节也不能吞掉.

sentences.en: In speaking English do not swallow a single syllable, however short it may be.
sentences.cn: 讲英语时， 哪怕是再短的音节也不能吞掉。

sentences.en: In syllabic languages each syllable has equal importance, and therefore equal time is needed.
sentences.cn: 对这类语言来说，每个音节都同样重要，所以需要同样的时间。

sentences.en: In this paper, the clustering problem of syllable pitch contours is studied.
sentences.cn: 主要研究音节基频包络的聚类问题.

sentences.en: Put in something about the Supernal Oneness . Don't say a syllable about the Infernal Twoness.
sentences.cn: 说一点天上的一元论,千万别谈地狱的二元论.

sentences.en: She didn't utter a syllable at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 她在会上一言未发.

sentences.en: She had uttered no syllable of reproach and that cut him.
sentences.cn: 她连半句责备的话也没说--这使他最难堪.

sentences.en: The accent falls on the third syllable.
sentences.cn: 重音落在第三个音节上。

sentences.en: The longest one - syllable word in the English language is screeched.
sentences.cn: 英语中最长的单音节词就是尖叫声.

sentences.en: The main stress in'photography'falls on the antepenultimate syllable.
sentences.cn: photography 一字的主重音在倒数第三个音节上.

sentences.en: The stress falls on the second syllable.
sentences.cn: 重音在第二个音节上。

sentences.en: Which syllable do the stress of this word fall on.
sentences.cn: 这个字的重音是在哪个音节上.

sentences.en: Which syllable does the stress of this word fall on?
sentences.cn: 这个字的重音是在哪个音节上?

words.tran_cn: 分成音节地；每音节地；藉著音节
划分音节；音节划分法（等于syllabification）
读出各个音节；使分成音节

phrases.tran_cn: 简单明了地；直截了当地

trans.tran_en: a word or part of a word which contains a single vowel sound
